text: Biggest problem with this game was there was only 2 bosses. If they had gotten past that it would easily have gone over better. More upgrades for the suit would have been nice, but I feel that awesome bosses are a bigger part of the Metroid series draw than collecting suit power-ups.

text:
How many will actually comment on this masterpiece of a track(the only reason I came here repeatedly)?

author: agaifi

text: I remember the first time I heard this track while playing, I thought my headphones had a problem. I actually like how sound from the left speaker comes in later, I guess that's part of what made it stand out from the rest for me. As for the game, I really liked it for its SP and MP. I never expected the SP to be as deep as the console ones so I didn't have a problem with it. Plus the graphics are still some of the best on the console, and that's coming from a 2006 launch title.
author: SupraDarky
